channel.title: NEW server on the way posting progress
channel.description:
[center]Cross~Islez Owners: Demon Tidal Crip
MOD ADAM CREATED the pics shown i changed choob isles some and like i said i am combineing another part to choob isles i am giving credit for half the server to mod adam
What we did is we both made a source and then combined them into 1 so when you start there will be a portal to my part of the server which is demon's isle and 1 portal to Tidal Crips part which is Port Raven, Mine is In Entrana and his in Catherby,
The server admins are as listed~
Demon (me) Tidal Crip (other owner) Blade Figure
The server has many great features like~ :Fighters Torso Mini Game :Full Barrows :Castle Wars :Many Great PK areas and boxes :Great new skill capes :Fully working mining, smithing, cooking, slayer, Fishing, wcing, slayer, runecrafting, agility, Armour triming, and much more :2 New Training place plus Jad drops fire cape Join today the next best server cross islez!! The ip of this server is~ Crossislez.no-ip.org OR Crossislezpk.no-ip.org
The Cross~Islez Map This is NOT showing the newer section Port Raven since we have not taken a picture of it yet
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/5104/choobisleworldmapjf6.jpg[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-07-07
Fully working mining [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/4664/miningit6.jpg[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-07-07
Brand New Training Boat [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img509.imageshack.us/img509/3885/newplayertraining1fj5.jpg[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-07-07
So come Join Today in the next best server ever!
Status: OFFLINE ~reason~ for 2-3 hours while were combineing the 2 servers...Will be on in 2-3 hours[/center]
